      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>

    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_79522</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_79522</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Pasteur's silkworm experiments</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Seidenraupeexperimente Pasteurs</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Expériences du ver à soie de Pasteur</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Experiências do bicho-da-seda de Pasteur</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Esperimenti del baco da seta del Pasteur</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πειράματα μεταξοσκωλήκων Pasteur</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Experimentos del gusano de seda de Pasteur</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Third of three illustrations showing Pasteur's silkworm experiments. This flow chart outlines the experiments conducted to confirm the connection between microorganisms and disease using silkworms.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Disease</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">experiments</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">flow chart</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Louis Pasteur</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">microorganisms</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">silkworms</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Third von drei Abbildungen, die Seidenraupe 
Pasteurs zeigen, experimentiert. Dieses Flußdiagramm umreißt 
die Experimente, die geleitet werden, um den Anschluß zwischen 
Mikroorganismen und Krankheit mit Seidenraupen zu bestätigen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le tiers de trois illustrations montrant le ver à
soie de Pasteur expérimente. Cet organigramme trace les grandes
lignes des expériences entreprises pour confirmer la connexion entre 
les micro-organismes et la maladie en utilisant des vers à soie.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O third de três ilustrações que mostram o 
bicho-da-seda de Pasteur experimenta. Esta carta de fluxo 
esboça as experiências conduzidas para confirmar a conexão entre 
microorganisms e doença usando bichos-da-seda.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un terzo di tre illustrazioni che mostrano il 
baco da seta del Pasteur sperimenta. Questo diagramma di flusso 
descrive gli esperimenti eseguiti per confermare il collegamento fra i
microorganismi e la malattia usando i bachi da seta.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τρίτο τριών απεικονίσεων που εμφανίζουν πειράματα 
μεταξοσκωλήκων Pasteur. Αυτό το διάγραμμα ροής 
περιγράφει τα πειράματα που πραγματοποιούνται για να επιβεβαιώσουν
τη σύνδεση μεταξύ των μικροοργανισμών και της ασθένειας 
χρησιμοποιώντας τους μεταξοσκώληκες.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El tercero de tres ilustraciones que muestran el 
gusano de seda de Pasteur experimenta. Este organigrama 
contornea los experimentos conducidos para confirmar la conexión 
entre los microorganismos y la enfermedad usando gusanos de seda.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Krankheit</string>
          </keyword>

            <string language="x-mt-de">Experimente</string>
